thread.title: Wal-Mart Reaches 'Line in Sand' Moment in Push to Improve Stores - Bloomberg Business
thread.title_full: Wal-Mart Reaches 'Line in Sand' Moment in Push to Improve Stores - Bloomberg Business

author: yahoo
title: Wal-Mart Reaches 'Line in Sand' Moment in Push to Improve Stores - Bloomberg Business
text:
Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on WhatsApp Share on LinkedIn Share on Reddit Share on Google+ E-mail Share on Twitter Share on WhatsApp For months, a digital clock has counted relentlessly down -- minutes, hours, days -- inside the headquarters of Wal-Mart Stores Inc.
The timer was set up after Greg Foran, head of the company’s U.S. operations, made Oct. 1 a “line in the sand” for transforming Wal-Mart into a cleaner, easier and friendlier place to shop. The 54-year-old executive has crisscrossed the country visiting stores, trying to bring them up to par.
Greg Foran Source: Wal-Mart Stores Inc. via Bloomberg The clock hit zero on Thursday -- and Foran is still at work.
